comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: An educated guess - that is the Orient Line LUSITANIA bottom right. Compare the bow, anchor, rigging, davitts, and figurehead with - [http://www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/4903284045/] Megazoom at PhM - from.ph/30572

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Good point re LUSITANIA, a bit difficult to tell. Although on closer inspection it appears to be washing day on deck there..? We LOVED the Petty's Hotel montage! The Fawlty Towers music was a nice touch :) As you mention, it must have been a favourite with photographers, who also seemed to loved capturing it from the same corner!
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
